tooltipTerminationMethod: Specifies app termination method (auto: automatic, graceful: normal, force: kill)
tooltipGracefulTimeout: Timeout in milliseconds for graceful termination (e.g., 5000 = 5 seconds)
tooltipProcessName: Process name to monitor (use | for multiple, * for wildcards)
tooltipSteamAppId: Steam Application ID (find in store page URL or SteamDB)
tooltipEpicGameId: Epic Games Launcher game ID (check desktop shortcut properties)
tooltipRiotGameId: Riot Client game identifier (valorant, bacon, league_of_legends, etc.)
tooltipGameActions: Auto-execute actions on game start/end (start: launch, stop: terminate, none: do nothing)
tooltipAppId: Unique identifier for managed app (alphanumeric and hyphens only, must be unique)
tooltipGameId: Unique identifier for game (alphanumeric and hyphens only, must be unique)
tooltipDisplayName: Name displayed in game launcher (Unicode characters and symbols allowed)
tooltip_display_name: Name shown in the launcher for this game
tooltip_platform: Choose the platform used to launch this game
tooltip_steam_app_id: Enter the Steam AppID (see store URL or SteamDB)
tooltip_epic_game_id: Enter the Epic Games ID (from shortcut properties)
tooltip_riot_game_id: Enter the Riot Client game ID (e.g., valorant)
tooltip_executable_path: Full path to the game executable (.exe)
tooltip_process_name: Process name(s) to monitor (use | to separate multiple names)
tooltip_comment: Optional notes or comments about this game
tooltip_apps_to_manage: Select managed apps to start/stop with the game
tooltip_integrations: Review and edit integrations such as OBS or Discord
launcherSubtitleText: Выберите и запустите настроенные игры. Щелкните правой кнопкой мыши для создания ярлыков.
launcherHintText: Выберите игру и нажмите кнопку запуска, или добавьте новые игры для начала работы
gameIntegrationDescription: Выберите функции интеграции для использования с этой игрой
helpDescription: A multi-platform game launcher with application management capabilities.
gameIdInvalidCharacters: Game ID can only contain alphanumeric characters, hyphens, and underscores
gameIdAlreadyExists: Game ID '{0}' is already in use. Please choose another.
steamAppIdRequired: Steam App ID is required for Steam platform
steamAppIdMust7Digits: Steam App ID must be a 7-digit number
epicGameIdRequired: Epic Game ID is required for Epic platform
epicGameIdInvalidFormat: Epic Game ID must start with 'apps/' or 'com.epicgames.launcher://apps/'
discordEnableAutoControl: Enable automatic control on game start
vtubeAutoStart: Automatically start VTube Studio on game start
vtubeAutoStop: Stop VTube Studio on game end
vtubeLaunchViaSteam: Рекомендуется: Запуск через Steam (требуется клиент Steam)
vtubeStudioSettingsSaveFailed: Failed to save VTube Studio settings
readmeTitle: Focus Game Deck - Ярлыки запуска игр
readmeDescription: Эта папка содержит ярлыки для игр, настроенных в Focus Game Deck.
readmeUsageStep1: 1. Дважды щелкните ярлык, чтобы запустить игру
readmeUsageStep2: 2. Focus Game Deck автоматически запустит игру и управляет связанными приложениями интеграции (OBS, Discord, VTube Studio и т.д.)
readmeUsageStep3: 3. При выходе из игры настроенные приложения интеграции автоматически останавливаются
readmeNote1: - Вы можете свободно удалять или перемещать ярлыки
readmeNote2: - При изменении настроек пересоздайте ярлыки из меню Инструменты
readmeNote3: - При возникновении проблем сообщите о них в разделе Issues репозитория GitHub
